means: 把…圈起来( ring的第三人称单数 )

sentence.Network_en: You don't have to go running upstairs every time she rings.
sentence.Network_cn: 用不着她一来电话你就往楼上跑。

sentence.Network_en: If the phone rings say you'll call back after dinner.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果有电话打来，就说你吃完饭再回电话。

sentence.Network_en: In graphite sheets, carbon atoms bond together in rings.
sentence.Network_cn: 石墨层中的碳原子相互连接形成碳环。

entry.def: When you ring someone, you telephone them.

example.ex: He rang me at my mother's...
example.tran: 他打电话到我妈妈家找我。

example.ex: If you'd like more information, ring the Hotline on 414 3929...
example.tran: 如果想了解更多信息，请拨打热线电话414 3929。

entry.def: When a telephone rings, it makes a sound to let you know that someone is phoning you.

example.ex: As soon as he got home, the phone rang...
example.tran: 他一回到家，电话就响了。

example.ex: The phone never stopped ringing.
example.tran: 这部电话一直响个不停。

entry.def: When you ring a bell or when a bell rings, it makes a sound.

example.ex: He heard the school bell ring...
example.tran: 他听见学校的铃声响了。

example.ex: The door was opened before she could ring the bell.
example.tran: 她还没来得及按门铃，门就开了。

entry.def: If you ring for something, you ring a bell to call someone to bring it to you. If you ring for someone, you ring a bell so that they will come to you.

example.ex: Shall I ring for a fresh pot of tea?...
example.tran: 要我按铃叫一壶新沏的茶水吗？

example.ex: He rang for the guard to let him out.
example.tran: 他按铃叫保安放他出去。

entry.def: If you say that a place is ringing with sound, usually pleasant sound, you mean that the place is completely filled with that sound.

example.ex: The whole place was ringing with music.
example.tran: 整个地方都回荡着音乐。

entry.tran: (说法、讨论、辩论等的)特性，特点
entry.def: You can use ring to describe a quality that something such as a statement, discussion, or argument seems to have. For example, if an argument has a familiar ring, it seems familiar.

example.ex: His proud boast of leading 'the party of low taxation' has a hollow ring.
example.tran: 他洋洋得意地吹嘘自己领导着“一个主张低税收的政党”，这听起来很空洞。

entry.def: If you say that someone rings the changes, you mean that they make changes or improvements to the way something is organized or done.

example.ex: Ring the changes by adding spices, dried fruit or olives.
example.tran: 加点香料、干果或橄榄以换换口味。

entry.tran: 记忆犹新;在耳边回响;在脑海中浮现
entry.def: If you say that someone's words ring in your ears or ring in your head, you mean that you remember them very clearly, usually when you would prefer to forget them.

example.ex: She shivered as the sound of that man's abuse rang in her ears.
example.tran: 她耳边回响起那个男人的辱骂气得浑身发抖。

entry.def: If you give someone a ring, you phone them.

example.ex: We'll give him a ring as soon as we get back.
example.tran: 我们一回来就会给他打电话。

entry.tran: (说法)听起来真实/听起来空洞
entry.def: If a statement rings true, it seems to be true or genuine. If it rings hollow, it does not seem to be true or genuine.

example.ex: Joanna's denial rang true...
example.tran: 乔安娜的否认听起来像是真的。

example.ex: The rumpus has made all the optimistic statements about unity and harmony ring a little hollow.
example.tran: 这一番吵闹使得所有关于团结和谐的乐观言论听起来都显得有几分空洞。

entry.def: A ring is a small circle of metal or other substance that you wear on your finger as jewellery.

example.ex: She wore several diamond rings.
example.tran: 她戴了好几个钻石戒指。

example.ex: ...a gold wedding ring.
example.tran: 黄金婚戒

entry.def: An object or substance that is in the shape of a circle can be described as a ring .

example.ex: Frank took a large ring of keys from his pocket.
example.tran: 弗兰克从口袋里掏出一大串钥匙。

example.ex: ...a ring of blue smoke.
example.tran: 蓝色的烟圈

entry.def: A group of people or things arranged in a circle can be described as a ring .

example.ex: They then formed a ring around the square.
example.tran: 然后他们在广场周围围成了一圈。

example.ex: ...grilled fish surrounded by a ring of thinly cut carrots.
example.tran: 边上放着一圈薄胡萝卜片的烤鱼

entry.def: A gas or electric ring is one of the small flat areas on top of a stove which heat up and which you use for cooking.

entry.tran: 圆形竞技（或表演）场地;拳击台;摔跤台;马戏台
entry.def: At a boxing or wrestling match or a circus, the ring is the place where the contest or performance takes place. It consists of an enclosed space with seats round it.

example.ex: He will never again be allowed inside a British boxing ring.
example.tran: 他被永久禁止踏入英国拳击赛场。

entry.def: You can refer to an organized group of people who are involved in an illegal activity as a ring .

example.ex: Police are investigating the suspected drug ring at the school.
example.tran: 警方正在调查这所学校的可疑贩毒团伙。

example.ex: ...an international spy ring.
example.tran: 国际间谍组织

entry.tran: (建筑物或地方)用…围起来，被…环绕
entry.def: If a building or place is ringed with or by something, it is surrounded by it.

example.ex: The areas are sealed off and ringed by troops.
example.tran: 这些地区被军队封锁包围了。

entry.def: If you ring a bird, you put a small metal ring around its leg so that you can identify it and study its movements and habits.

example.ex: He demonstrated his techniques for ringing birds.
example.tran: 他展示了给鸟儿环志的技术。

entry.def: If you say that someone runs rings round you or runs rings around you, you mean that they are a lot better or a lot more successful than you at a particular activity.

example.ex: Mentally, he can still run rings round men half his age!
example.tran: 他在智力上仍远远高于那些比他年轻一半的人。

means.word_mean: 1. gymnastic apparatus consisting of a pair of heavy metal circles (usually covered with leather) suspended by ropes; used for gymnastic exercises;

sentences.sentence: "the rings require a strong upper body"

auth_sentence.content: It's like dendrochronology - the rings in trees.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's like dendrochronology - the rings in trees.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's like dendrochronology - the rings in trees.

auth_sentence.content: But the magic of the Rings is Harry Potterish.
auth_sentence.res_content: But the magic of the Rings is Harry Potterish.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But the magic of the Rings is Harry Potterish.

auth_sentence.content: The problem is the rings are almost pure ice.
auth_sentence.res_content: The problem is the rings are almost pure ice.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The problem is the rings are almost pure ice.
